destinations.name: Long Beach
destinations.description: Stretching for more than twenty kilometers along the coastline, Long Beach (“Bai Truong” in Vietnamese) is the longest and most famous beach on this island

destinations.name: Doc Let Beach
destinations.description: Considered the most stunning beach in Khanh Hoa Province, Doc Let is a great hideaway in Southern Vietnam

destinations.name: My Khe Beach
destinations.description: Among the fabulous sandy best beaches in Vietnam, My Khe Beach is the most famous

destinations.name: Ly Son Beach
destinations.description: Ly Son Island in Quang Ngai is one of the best beaches in Vietnam

destinations.name: Ti Top Beach
destinations.description: Ti Top Beach on Ti Top Island is one of the top-rated Vietnam's beaches in Ha Long that you should not miss out on

destinations.name: Do Son Beach
destinations.description: Do Son Beach in Hai Phong is one of the best beaches in Vietnam in summer thanks to its convenient location and outstanding beauty

destinations.name: Ky Co Beach
destinations.description: Located about 25 kilometers away from Quy Nhon, Ky Co Beach has a pristine beauty with blue sea and white sand

destinations.name: Thien Cam Beach
destinations.description: Tucked away in the province of Ha Tinh, Vietnam, lies the hidden gem of Thien Cam Beach, a haven of pristine beauty and tranquility

destinations.name: Lang Co Beach
destinations.description: Voted as one of the world’s most beautiful bays in 2009, Lang Co Bay in Thua Thien Hue province is a top place for a beach vacation in Central Vietnam

destinations.name: Fansipan Peak
destinations.description: Fansipan is the highest mountain in Vietnam, also known as the Roof of Indochina

destinations.name: Bach Ma
destinations.description: Situated within the Bạch Mã National Park and reaching a height of 1,450m, this area is renowned as a famous cool retreat in Vietnam

destinations.name: Langbiang
destinations.description: Langbiang Mountain - Da Lat, one of the ideal tourist destinations for travelers. Langbiang is known far and wide as an ideal tourist destination

destinations.name: Pu Si Lung
destinations.description: Pu Si Lung (3,076m) is a mountain located in the northwest of Lai Chau province, between the Da River and the upper reaches of the Nam Na River (a tributary of the Da River) on the Vietnam-China border

destinations.name: Ho Chi Minh
destinations.description: Ho Chi Minh City, the largest city in Vietnam, is a vibrant metropolis. A visit to this bustling city is incomplete without exploring its iconic landmarks

destinations.name: Hai Phong
destinations.description: Hai Phong, as the third largest city in Vietnam, offers the best of nature and cuisine

destinations.name: Ha Noi
destinations.description: It is a captivating city that seamlessly combines history and modernity

destinations.name: Hoi An
destinations.description: Hoi An City, known for its picturesque streets, lantern-lit alleys, and cultural landmarks, is a popular destination for tourists visiting Vietnam

promotions.name: Weekend Grand Buffet
promotions.label: New
promotions.description: Featuring mouthwatering combinations with a choice of five different salads, six enticing appetizers, six main entrees and five choicest desserts. Free flowing bubbly and soft drinks. All for just $19.99 per person

leaders.name: Peter Pan
leaders.description: Our CEO, Peter, credits his hardworking East Asian immigrant parents who undertook the arduous journey to the shores of America with the intention of giving their children the best future. His mother's wizardy in the kitchen whipping up the tastiest dishes with whatever is available inexpensively at the supermarket, was his first inspiration to create the fusion cuisines for which The Frying Pan became well known. He brings his zeal for fusion cuisines to this restaurant, pioneering cross-cultural culinary connections.

leaders.name: Dhanasekaran Witherspoon
leaders.description: Our CFO, Danny, as he is affectionately referred to by his colleagues, comes from a long established family tradition in farming and produce. His experiences growing up on a farm in the Australian outback gave him great appreciation for varieties of food sources. As he puts it in his own words, Everything that runs, wins, and everything that stays, pays!

leaders.name: Agumbe Tang
leaders.description: Blessed with the most discerning gustatory sense, Agumbe, our CFO, personally ensures that every dish that we serve meets his exacting tastes. Our chefs dread the tongue lashing that ensues if their dish does not meet his exacting standards. He lives by his motto, You click only if you survive my lick.

leaders.name: Alberto Somayya
leaders.description: Award winning three-star Michelin chef with wide International experience having worked closely with whos-who in the culinary world, he specializes in creating mouthwatering Indo-Italian fusion experiences. He says, Put together the cuisines from the two craziest cultures, and you get a winning hit! Amma Mia!
